entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
